# never

**Type Property**

A strategy to never display sign symbols.

## Declaration

```swift
static var never: NumberFormatStyleConfiguration.SignDisplayStrategy { get }
```

## Sign display strategies

- **automatic**: A strategy to automatically configure locale-appropriate sign display behavior.
- **always(includingZero:)**: A strategy to always display sign symbols.
